acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs with generified collections in the constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojoWithGenerifiedCollectionsInConstructor

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty

Then the collection should have exactly OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 74 byteObjectField = 5 shortField = 40 shortObjectField = 112 charField = N charObjectField = z intField = -1838749550 intObjectField = 1891673268 longField = 847047111487413 longObjectField = 847047110613915 floatField = 0.26163793 floatObjectField = 0.0128631 doubleField = 0.015739246396934914 doubleObjectField = 0.3261164815583897 stringField = dMGVwCGSoZ objectField = java.lang.Object@2a934bba calendarField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:43 ICT 2016 dateField = Sun Aug 21 23:35:43 ICT 2016 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@35afca01 intArray = [I@2c4c5627 booleanArray = [Z@15cf0837 bigDecimalField = 272099977495 ) elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{p2B93iZP9M=java.util.GregorianCalendar[time=1471797343971 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly areFieldsSet=true elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@24c6f389 elements
